title: Fudanshi Bartender no Tashinami
description:
Hibiki Soichiro works as a bartender while hiding the fact that he is a rotten boy.
His secret pleasure is to fantasize about BL with customers.
Normally he acts as a cool waiter, but sometimes he gets caught up in his own fantasy world.
Can you make it through the poker face--?
A must-see for rotten girls and men! A gag comedy that is sure to be up to a sympathetic start!

---

Soichiro Hibiki works as a bartender while hiding himself as a Fudanshi. His secret pleasures is to fantasize about his customers! WHAT?

He’s usually dressed as a cool bartender but sometimes he’d make a trip to a world of delusions. WHAT?

[b][u]Indonesian/Bahasa Indonesia:[/u][/b]
[spoiler]
Yuk kita lihat bagaimana keseharian dari Hibiki Souichirou, seorang bartender yg menyembunyikan identitasnya sebagai seorang otaku dan fudanshi.
[/spoiler]
